title: NDRF
text: The aim of the National Disaster Management Authority is to build a safer and disaster resilient India by developing a holistic, proactive, multi-disaster and technology driven strategy for disaster management. This has to be achieved through a culture of prevention , mitigation and preparedness to generate a prompt and efficient response at the time of disasters.

section.title: Why Blockchain?
section.content: Blockchain is used to address the challenges in disaster response mechanisms. It is a secure, distributed, and immutable digital ledger that records transactions
